name: Contractor
constraints: Scan in attendance using the Verified QR code on arrival.
Scan out attendance using the Verified QR code on exit.
Applying checkseal on Team Member, visitor, or contractor goods (arrival).
Checking checkseal on Team Member, visitor, or contractor goods (exit).
bestPractice: Manage visitors and contractors who arrive at the store by informing the management team, ensuring they scan in attendance using the Verified QR code, and applying checkseal on Team Member, visitor, or contractor goods.

Manage visitors and contractors who exit the store by informing the management team, ensuring they scan out attendance using the Verified QR code, and checking checkseal on Team Member, visitor, or contractor goods.
